product_metadata.plan_type: Non-linked, Non-participating, Individual Life Insurance Savings Plan
product_metadata.tax_positioning: Tax-free returns as per Section 10(10D) (subject to conditions)
product_metadata.key_disclaimer: Guaranteed benefits depend on PT, PPT and other factors.

product_summary.objective: Guaranteed Wealth Goal is designed to help customers achieve long-term goals like education, retirement, home or legacy by offering guaranteed lump sum or income payouts under three variants with life cover protection.
key_highlights: Life cover during the entire policy term
Choice of three plan variants based on goal need
Guaranteed lump sum corpus or guaranteed income
Guaranteed Additions and Income Boosters accrue over term
Return of Premium (ROP) option available in income variants
Death benefit minimum floor of 105% of premiums paid

plan_variants.goal_type: Guaranteed corpus at end of policy term
Guaranteed income stream + lumpsum ROP at end
plan_variants.special_feature: Income continues even if life assured dies during income period
benefit_structure: Income Instalments = Base Income + Income Boosters
Death Benefit Instalments + ROP on death

plan_variants.goal_type: Guaranteed second source of income + optional ROP
plan_variants.special_feature: Life cover continues throughout policy term including income period
benefit_structure: Lump sum Death Benefit during policy term

core_benefits.details: Guaranteed Maturity Benefit (GMB) plus accrued Guaranteed Additions payable as lump sum at end of policy term.
core_benefits.gmb_formula: GMB Factor × Total Premiums Paid (factor varies by age, PPT, PT and SA multiple).
core_benefits.ga_accrual: Added at end of each year from year 2 onwards.

core_benefits.details: Income Instalments payable during Income Period = Base Income + Accrued Income Boosters.
core_benefits.income_booster: Accrues yearly from end of 2nd policy year till end of Deferment Period.

core_benefits.details: ROP benefit paid along with last income instalment.
core_benefits.multiple_range: 50% to 300% of total premiums paid (in steps of 25%).

core_benefits.details: At least Sum Assured on Death payable, subject to 105% premium floor.
core_benefits.guaranteed_floor: Death benefit never less than 105% of Total Premiums Paid or surrender value.

core_benefits.details: Nominee receives Death Benefit Instalments annually during income period plus ROP at end. Option available to take PV lump sum at discount rate 8.25%.
Nominee receives lump sum Sum Assured on Death. Income variant maturity benefit depends on whether ROP was chosen.

eligibility_and_parameters.female_advantage: Age setback of 3 years applicable for SA multiple, Base Income, GMB calculation.

sum_assured_multiple_rules.income_variants: Multiples vary by age band and option (refer company factors).

pv_lump_sum_option.details: Nominee can commute instalments + ROP into lump sum.

multiple_variant_selection.rule: At inception, customer can choose one or more variants under same policy.
multiple_variant_selection.change_rule: Variant and parameters cannot be changed later.

compliance_guardrails.guaranteed_disclaimer: All benefits are guaranteed provided policy is in-force and premiums are paid.
compliance_guardrails.tax_disclaimer: Tax benefits subject to Section 10(10D) and prevailing laws.
compliance_guardrails.death_floor_rule: Death benefit minimum 105% of premiums paid or surrender value.
compliance_guardrails.parameter_lock: Variant, DP, IP, PPT, PT once chosen cannot be changed.

retrieval_chunks.text: Guaranteed Wealth Goal offers Wealth Creation, Assured Income and Second Income variants depending on whether customer wants lump sum or long-term income.
Wealth Creation variant pays Guaranteed Maturity Benefit plus Guaranteed Additions accrued yearly from year 2 onwards.
Income Boosters accrue each year from end of year 2 till deferment completion and are paid as part of every income instalment.
ROP benefit payable with last instalment, selectable from 50% to 300% of premiums in steps of 25%.
Death benefit is Annualized Premium × SA multiple with minimum floor of 105% premiums paid or surrender value, whichever is higher.
